trans-unit.source: Stores an ordered pair of integers, which specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>.
trans-unit.target: Przechowuje parę uporządkowanych liczb całkowitych, które określają <> </> *> i <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The Size class is used to specify a height and width through the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A> property for <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> and other graphics classes.
trans-unit.target: Pozwala określić wysokość i szerokość za pośrednictwem klasy wielkości <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A>Właściwość <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>i innych klas grafiki.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can perform operations on a Size by using the overloaded operators such as <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Można wykonywać operacje na rozmiarze przy użyciu przeciążone operatory, takie jak <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>i <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the Size structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
trans-unit.target: Jednostką <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>i <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>rozmiaru struktury są zależne od <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>i <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A>Ustawienia <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>obiekt, który jest używany do rysowania.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should avoid depending on GetHashCode for unique values, as two <xref:System.Drawing.Size> objects with the same values for their <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> properties may return the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: Należy unikać w zależności od GetHashCode unikatowość wartości jako dwa <xref:System.Drawing.Size>obiekty o tej samej wartości dla ich <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>i <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>Właściwości może zwracać taki sam skrót.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: This behavior could change in a future release.
